security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document pertains to the payroll records of Judith R. Burford, an employee of the HSCA, including personal leave records and payroll authorization forms detailing her employment as a Document Clerk.
summary_one_paragraph: This document consists of payroll records for Judith R. Burford, who served as a Document Clerk for the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes a personal leave record from 1978 and payroll authorization forms documenting her employment, salary adjustments, and effective dates of her position within the Assassinations Committee, authorized by Chairman Louis Stokes. Additionally, it includes internal memos regarding her onboarding, qualifications, and payroll certification requirements.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records for Judith R. Burford
recipient: Tom Howarth, Tom Lambeth, All Staff
